name: Yo Noid 4: Episode 3
description:
THIS GAME IS A WORK-IN-PROGRESS

The Noid is back in the long-awaited final episode of The Noid 4.

The Noid, and his Sidekick Pepe the Pepperoni, journey to Pepe's home planet: The Dominos (TM) Pizza Planet (TM), to save it from enslavement from an insane Hatsune Miku who is threatening to put pineapple on every pizza.

And it's now more than just the special stages

Version 0.3 includes:

  • Two full acts (Tomato Plant) and one boss fight.
  • The entire special stage game to free-play.
  • More custom special stages.
  • Play as The Noid's plucky sidekick: Original the Character, Pepe the Pepperoni, and his game-breaking Jetpack
